label.h3: How do you update a pivot table’s layout?

choicegroup.choice: Select ‘Layout’ then ‘Edit’. Select the desired layout and click ‘Save’
Click on the Options button then the Style tab. Select the column, rows and filter then click ‘Update’
Drag and drop the data dimensions to columns, rows and filter then click ‘Update’

div.p: You can change a pivot table’s layout by dragging and dropping the dimensions to the columns, rows, and filter then clicking ‘Update’.
